text: Valerio Carrara (3 March 1951 â€“ 9 February 2022) was an Italian politician. He was a member of Italy of Values, Forza Italia, and The People of Freedom. He was in the Senate of the Republic from 2001 to 2013. Carrara was born in Oltre il Colle, Italy. Carrara died in Seriate, Italy on 9 February 2022, at the age of 70. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Lombardy
title: Valerio Carrara
